These rumors, the rumors the Nords speak of, they're Legends. They must be. This chest, Pandoras Chest, is said to...
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/KYHWkxe.png[/img][/center]
READ: I'm currently working on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/56391/?]Utility Player Home - FNV[/url] so development may be slow on this mod
----------------------
[i]The Dovahkiin will be reborn, he shall be unkillable, undeniable ... immortal.

These rumors, the rumors the Nords speak of, they're Legends. They must be. This chest, Pandoras Chest, is said to contain many weapons, armor...elixirs. The Dovahkiin must begin the journey, adventure of a lifetime, to find and possible take advantage of the Pandoras Chest.[/i]

[size=5]Read the NOTE at the bottom[/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/BxhZLhA.png[/img]
Manual
-------------
1.Download and open the file
2.Open your Skyrim DATA directory (i.e Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data)
3.Drag and drop /Extract the PandorasChest.esp to the DATA folder
4.DONE!
NMM
---------
See NMM Tuts.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eUikP2U.png[/img]
TotallyExoticHD
Bethesda
Creation Kit

NOTE : The mod is currently a player home, more will come SOON!
